A '''broom closet''' is a location within the fictionalized [[Mojang Studios]].  It was where [[M.A.R.I.L.L.A.]] resides until she was hired by [[Jomang Studios]] in [[How We Make Minecraft|How We Make Minecraft - Series Two.]]
